body.p: also includes a set of drivers that improve running OS/2 in a virtual machine. Due to restrictions of OS/2 itself, this variant of the Guest Additions has a limited feature set. Specifically, seamless windows and automatic guest resizing are not implemented in Guest Additions for OS/2 because of inherent limitations of the OS/2 graphics system.
The OS/2 Guest Additions are provided on the same ISO CD-ROM as those for the other platforms. Mount the ISO in OS/2 as described in . The OS/2 Guest Additions are located in the directory \OS2.
We do not provide an automatic installer. See the readme.txt file in the CD-ROM directory, which describes how to install the OS/2 Guest Additions manually.
